# Data process

## Cuba

### Wave 1

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `NEO12B` | 
|-|-|
| **Label** | `gait - time in seconds taken to walk 10 metres?` | 
| **Table name** | `1066-Cuba-Baseline` | 
| **Units** | `seconds` |
| **Missing Values** | `0; 1; 992; NA` |
| **Description** |  |

```{r assign_cuba1, echo=FALSE}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_ws','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline', variables=list('NEO12B'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_ws <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_ws')
```

```{r local_cuba1, echo=FALSE}
vbl <- t1066_ws$NEO12B
vbl_miss <- c(0, 1, 992)
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[3], caption = attributes(vbl)$`spss::shortName`)
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)$summary, caption = "Summary")
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[2], caption = "Values")
ggplot(t1066_ws, aes(x=NEO12B)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue", data = . %>% filter(!vbl %in% vbl_miss)) + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `10m/s -> walking_speed_c`
* `walking_speed_c <=25% into walking_speed=0`
* `walking_speed_c >25% into walking_speed=1`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo_cuba1}

t1066_ds_cuba_w1 <- t1066_ws %>% structure(spec=NULL) %>%
  mutate(walking_speed_c = case_when(!NEO12B %in% c(NA, vbl_miss) ~ 10/as.vector(NEO12B),
                                     NEO12B < 2.5 ~ 991,
                                     TRUE ~ 999),
         q = quantile(car::recode(walking_speed_c, "999=NA"), probs = 1/4, na.rm = TRUE, names = FALSE),
         walking_speed = case_when(walking_speed_c <= q ~ 0, 
                                   walking_speed_c %in% c(991:999) ~ walking_speed_c, 
                                   walking_speed_c > q ~ 1)) %>%
  select(-NEO12B, -q)

```

#### Statistics of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript_cuba1, echo=FALSE}

vbl <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$walking_speed_c
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1 %>% filter(!vbl %in% miss_values_vector), aes(x=(walking_speed_c))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.001, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")


vbl <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$walking_speed
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1, aes(x=factor(walking_speed))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```

```{r local_DR1, echo=FALSE}
vbl <- t1066_ws$NEO12B
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `10m/s -> walking_speed_c`
* `walking_speed_c <=25% into walking_speed=0`

**R script:**

```{r harmo_DR1}

t1066_ds_DR_w1 <- t1066_ws %>% structure(spec=NULL) %>%

  select(-NEO12B, -q)
```
